title: Input, $$t$$
text: The input is $$t=2$$, so $$2$$ seconds after the projectile.

title: Output
text: $$s'(t)=rate$$ of change of the height of the projectile over time (in feet/second), so $$s'(2)=rate$$ of change of the height at $$t=2$$.

title: $$\frac{Increasing}{Decreading}$$
text: The rate of change is positive, so we say the projectile is increasing in height.

title: Explanation
text: After $$2$$ seconds, the projectile is increasing in height at a rate of $$16$$ feet per second.
